title: Understanding Extract Range
text: An extract range is a specific area in Excel where data is copied based on certain criteria. It is used to filter and display only the records that meet the specified conditions.

title: Criteria Range vs. Extract Range
text: The criteria range is where you specify the conditions for filtering data, while the extract range is where the filtered data is copied to.

hintAnswer: a range to which Excel copies the records that meet the comparison criteria from the criteria ranged
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes an extract range?
choices: a location separate from the table used to list specific search specifications
a range to which Excel copies the records that meet the comparison criteria from the criteria ranged
a special use of the search string
